00022 #include "Common/Compat.h"

00024 #include "Common/CommandShell.h"
00025 #include "Config.h"

00027 namespace Hypertable { namespace Config {
00028 
00029 void init_command_shell_options() {
00030   CommandShell::add_options(cmdline_desc());
00031 }
00032 
00033 void init_master_client_options() {
00034   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00035     ("master", str()->default_value("localhost:38050"),
00036         "master server to connect in <host:port> format")
00037     ("master-timeout", i32()->default_value(30000),
00038         "Timeout in seconds for master connection")
00039     ;
00040   alias("master-timeout", "Hypertable.Master.Timeout");
00041   // hidden aliases
00042   alias("master-host", "Hypertable.Master.Host");
00043   alias("master-port", "Hypertable.Master.Port");
00044 }
00045 
00046 void init_master_client() {
00047   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("master"));
00048   bool defaulted = properties->defaulted("master");
00049   properties->set("master-host", e.host, defaulted);
00050   properties->set("master-port", e.port, !e.port || defaulted);
00051 }
00052 
00053 void init_range_server_client_options() {
00054   cmdline_desc().add_options()
00055     ("range-server", str()->default_value("localhost:38060"),
00056         "range server to connect in <host:port> format")
00057     ("range-server-timeout", i32()->default_value(30000),
00058         "Timeout in seconds for range server connection")
00059     ;
00060   alias("range-server-timeout", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Timeout");
00061   // hidden aliases
00062   alias("rs-port", "Hypertable.RangeServer.Port");
00063 }
00064 
00065 void init_range_server_client() {
00066   Endpoint e = InetAddr::parse_endpoint(get_str("range-server"));
00067   bool defaulted = properties->defaulted("range-server");
00068   properties->set("rs-host", e.host, defaulted);
00069   properties->set("rs-port", e.port, !e.port || defaulted);
00070 }
